## NS.getServerMaxRam() method

Get the max RAM on a server.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getServerMaxRam(host: string): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  host | string | Hostname of the target server. |

<b>Returns:</b>

number

max ram (GB)

## Remarks

RAM cost: 0.05 GB
